constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 88 (Thursday, May 20, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CARTWRIGHT:
H.R. 3378.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3 (relating to the power of
Congress to regulate Commerce with foreign Nations, and among
the several States, and with the Indian Tribes.)
[Page H2652]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Nutrition, Oversight, and Department Operations.

title: CSA OPPORTUNITY Act
